news_header: Washington Trust Bancorp reported a revenue of $48.98 million for Q4 2024, a 6.6% increase year-over-year, with an EPS of $0.59.
news_text: Washington Trust Bancorp (WASH) reported $48.98 million in revenue for the quarter ended December 2024, marking a 6.6% year-over-year increase. The EPS for the same period was $0.59, down from $0.76 a year ago. The revenue exceeded the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 1.29%, while the EPS surprise was 1.72%. Analysts emphasize the importance of key metrics for assessing a company's performance, which can influence stock price projections. Zacks Investment Research also highlights 7 elite stocks from their list of strong buys, which have historically outperformed the market.
